title: ThemeConfig
description: Chativa widget theme and positioning configuration. Pass a partial object to chatStore.getState().setTheme() — only the fields you provide will be overridden.

colors.description: Brand color palette. All values are CSS color strings (hex, rgb, hsl, etc.).

primary.description: Primary accent color — used for the chat button, user message bubbles, focus rings, and the header gradient start.

secondary.description: Secondary accent color — used for the header gradient end and hover states.

text.description: Primary text color used inside the widget.

border.description: Border color for inputs, dividers, and card outlines.

position.description: Corner of the screen where the chat button (and widget) appears.

positionMargin.description: Distance from the screen edge. Each level equals 0.5rem increments starting at 0.5rem (level 1 = 0.5rem, level 5 = 2.5rem).

size.description: Size of the launcher button. Affects the button diameter.

width.description: CSS width of the chat panel.

height.description: CSS height of the chat panel.

maxWidth.description: CSS max-width constraint — useful on mobile.

horizontalSpace.description: Horizontal gap between the panel edge and the viewport edge (same scale as positionMargin).

verticalSpace.description: Vertical gap between the panel and the launcher button.
